name: Cody the Wolfie Boy (PC Port)
description:
This Game was Inspired by the famous Sonic (PC Port) Game (That Includes the remake.).

Use the arrow keys to move through the levels

Press "SPACE" to Jump

(WARNING: Please don't report OR take down this project just because it has creepy stuff, please!)

Notes:

Note #1: This was Inspired by the game: Sonic (PC Port)

and it's remake.

Note #2: This is available on Scratch, a link to the web & Game Jolt as well!

Credits:

Blue Tails, Cody the Wolfie Boy, Lord Wolfie X's Luckles and Cat Cody and Lord Wolfie X himself belong to me.

@MUGENWarrior for the Sonic.EXE Physics

All Sound effects, Music Sprites and Coding belong to their rightful owners!

If there are any Bugs I missed, let me know and I'll fix them!
